title: Dread Companion
description: "Here is vintage Andre Norton, who is outstanding among science fiction authors. The story is about a girl changeling who leads her brother and an older girl, Kilda, into an evil and enchanted land... Evoking a feeling of terror and horror, the author tells a fantastic tale with the implied theme of evil fighting against good and the power of a strong will to survive. It's all cloaked in mystery and magic with the hint of Rip van Winkle conclusion updated to the year 2483."Avid readers of science fiction will enjoy this one and it should make new converts."
author: Andre Norton
